author: Briar Stewart,Chris Corday
title: 'I felt a tiny bit invincible until I got this': Vancouver ER doctor with COVID-19 shares his story
description: Dr. Joseph Finkler of Vancouver is among dozens of front-line health-care workers who have been infected with COVID-19 in Canada. He says it has been a humbling experience, but he is looking forward to the day when he's cleared to return to work and continue …
content:
When Dr. Joseph Finkler started feeling run-down at the beginning of last week, he attributed the fatigue to the string of night shifts he had been working at the emergency department of St. Paul's Hospital in Vancouver.
Same thing when he noticed he had a s… [+4880 chars]
